1)Material delivery coordination.

14)submittal tracking, material delivery, pricing of change notices and contract document coordination.

It is obviously life changing event when you step from student life to professional life. It is an unexpected journey so far. I got to learn a lot not only on technical fronts but also life lessons. I made new friends and increased my social circle. Most important learning was how to manage your personal and professional life side by side. The things may not always go our way but keep on working hard and the results will go our way someday. Hardest part of job is managing the resources to complete the work within stipulated time with high safety and quality. Most enjoyable part of the job is the satisfaction you get after completing your targets.

Shapoorji Pallonji Group is one of the oldest business groups in the Engineering and Construction Business operating out of India. Its core values of integrity coupled with excellence has earned trust with its both internal as well as external customers. It is a fantastic place to learn about the business practices esp. relevant to the old economy. Further, with the changing global business scenarios, the firm is looking to develop a  focus on technology and innovation in this VUCA world.

The job elements are challenging and required deep understanding of the business opportunities. The company offers good training opportunities to its star employees.

Being a trainee, you have to follow a structured module and learn about all the aspects of the construction business.
Work hours are not defined, might need to work on Sundays also.
Work get tiring if its not your cup of tea.

That was very nice project  to work in SPCL as Deputy construction manager. I was allocated to work with my team- 2 floors below Ground level ( basement  floor) which is near to river bed and that was challenged , but  we succeeded on this project.

good work culture, good life balances , good supportive from top management To leaner to implement .To improve personal skill and innovative ideas.  overall excellent company
I was worked with spcl from last 4 years, company overall is very very   good in all activites.

Have vast professional  26 years experience in Civil engineering construction field such   as construction of multi storied residential & industrial building, villas & bungalows, steel & power plant, refinery /petroleum projects too. I have operated with diversified domain projects in Civil Engineering ranging from medium to large scale industries which gave me an in depth understanding for handling various domain areas in Civil Engineering. I have handled various critical and challenging projects in INDIA & DUBAI  and ensured that the projects gets implemented as per specification in stipulated time with safety & quality. Having equipped and expertise with various latest engineering tools and techniques, cost evaluation techniques and tools which I applied in my professional career to produce cost-effective solutions for the organization I worked with. I can handle high pressure environments with ease and open mind and also a good team player. I have efficient communication skill to present my points precisely to listeners.     All the above projects completed with reputed organization such as Shapoorji Pallonji &Co Ltd., Dodsal Engineering & Construction Pte. 	Technically accomplished professional with over 19+ years’ rich experience in India and Abroad Project Planning & Control, Site & Construction Management, Quality, Coordination and Team Management with well known organizations.
	Interface with clients to define project requirements. Establish project work plan and deadlines.
	In-depth knowledge and hands on experience in supervising structural and finishing works.
	Documented track record of success in spearheading challenging and complex projects and executing them to hand-over stage, within the stipulated time frame.
	Good communication skills facilitating effective liaison with various departments, sub-contractors, designers, vendors, and clients so as to complete a project in stipulated timeframe.
	Working closely with other functional areas of the organization, project contractors, internal team members, external collaborators and suppliers. Meeting with department representatives, architects, engineers and consultants to establish project requirements, specifications and schedules. 
	Recognized for attention to detail, adherence to standards with exceptional skills in managing teams.
	A confident persuasive team maker able to communicate effectively across diverse cultures to achieve exceptional business performance

Led and managed of a project team of more than 60 members comprising of project managers, project engineers , supervisors and supporting staff

Conferred with clients and other members of the engineering team and conducted research to determine project requirements

Developed an overall integrated construction baseline schedule and work break-down structure of logistics, HR, material, tasks/activities

Achieved 80% of time and cost budget in maintaining project controls 

Ensured construction plans met specifications of building codes and other regulations

Provided technical and administrative support to the project team through technical report writing, engineering communications and technical presentation

Maintained project documentation and assisted in preparing contractual and legal correspondences

Developed site manpower and material tracking reports to keep accurate tab on project progress

Attended daily site, design,  sub-contractors’ progress  review meetings to mitigate any possible delay

Coordinated with many agencies and sub-contractors - resulted in ‘in-time’ material delivery

Conducted site survey and prepared technical reports for project feasibility studies
